DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine value combine Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) Protocols include acupuncture In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Traditional Chinese Medicine In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Success Rates
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject able understand provide consent 2 . Subject female , 2142 year age time screen least one l ovary 3 . Subject BMI > 18 < 32 4 . Subject experience primary secondary infertility 5 . Subject may receive sperm donate source 6 . Subject 's partner sperm ejaculate 7 . Subject 's serum basal FSH < 11 IU/L 8 . Subject 's serum basal estradiol level 2080 pg/mL 9 . Subject 's TSH level < 3.0 mv/mL 10 . Subject 's prolactin level < 24 ng/mL 11 . Subject agree limit caffeine intake one cup ( 76.5 mL/day ) time randomization 12 . Subject agrees make alteration diet lifestyle practice Medical Practitioner deem necessary best interest subject 13 . Subject agree participate research opportunity duration study 1 . Subject pursue sex selection 2 . Subject undergoing treatment egg donor 3 . Subject experience 2 previous fail cycle 4 . Subject undergoing heparin lovenoxbased protocol 5 . Subject currently take herbal therapy ( 1 week washout ) 6 . Subject currently take cointerventions moxibustion cup 7 . Subject exhibit uterine anomaly ( i.e. , bicornuate , unicornuate uterus , ) 8 . Subject diagnose severe endometriosis define endometriomas > 4cm 9 . Subject currently receive acupuncture therapy ( Subject must agree 30 day washout period prior randomization ) 10 . Subject history recurrent spontaneous abortion define > 3 11 . Subjects Beck Depression Inventory ( BDIII ) 29 high screening , indicative severe depression , exclude study refer psychological evaluation inhouse license mental health professional .
